messages.title: A Listening Leader
messages.content: David Nikolay puts local people first - listening, campaigning tirelessly on our behalf.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackle unauthorised encampments and ensure developers’ contributions benefit the community.
Helping families get the support they need by fighting for every penny from Surrey.
Meet the immediate financial challenge without cutting services or raising council tax.
Ensure our NHS workers are rewarded and NHS services in Ewell are properly funded.
Campaigns for improved safety measures to reduce antisocial behaviour and speeding.
Defend Ewell’s parks and open spaces, keeping them accessible to everyone.

issues.economy: A Fair Deal for Ewell: Meet the immediate financial challenge without cutting services or raising council tax.
issues.environment: Protecting Green Spaces: Defend Ewell’s parks and open spaces, keeping them accessible to everyone.
issues.health: NHS Heroes: Ensure our NHS workers are rewarded and NHS services in Ewell are properly funded.
issues.socialWelfare: Supporting Families: Helping families get the support they need by fighting for every penny from Surrey.

housing.content: Tackle unauthorised encampments and ensure developers’ contributions benefit the community.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm proud to have been part of the Labour team leading the charge to protect Ewell's precious green spaces...

politicalExperience.achievements: Leading the charge to protect Ewell's green spaces, helping to secure the future of Ewell Village Library...

endorsements.endorsement: David has been an invaluable member of the team in Ewell Court, Auriol & Cuddington...

quotes.text: I'm proud to have been part of... the Labour team leading the charge...

leaflet.additionalNotes: Endorsed by Keir Starmer. Labour Party leader.
